lead_paragraph: Anthony, an eight-time N.B.A. All-Star, will be an owner of Puerto Rico F.C., an expansion team in the North American Soccer League, the league announced on Thursday.

headline.main: Carmelo Anthony Becomes a Soccer Team Owner in Puerto Rico

snippet: Anthony, an eight-time N.B.A. All-Star, will be an owner of Puerto Rico F.C., an expansion team in the North American Soccer League, the league announced on Thursday.
